Animal Filter - HTML code



<h1>Animals</h1>
<form id="filters">
    <fieldset>
        <input type="radio" id="frog" name="animal" value="frog">
        <label for="bear">Frogs</label>
        <input type="radio" id="manatee" name="animal" value="manatee">
        <label for="frog">Manatees</label>
        <input type="radio" id="panda" name="animal" value="panda">
        <label for="duck">Pandas</label>
        <input type="radio" id="squirrel" name="animal" value="squirrel">
        <label for="giraffe">Squirrels</label>
        <input type="radio" id="all" name="animal" value="all" checked="true">
        <label for="all">Show All</label>
    </fieldset>
    <input type="search" id="searchID" />
    <button>Search</button>
</form>

Animal Filter - JS code



  const radioButtons = document.querySelectorAll('input[name="animal"]');

  // Add a click event listener to each radio button
  radioButtons.forEach((radioButton) => {
    radioButton.addEventListener("click", function() {
      // Check which radio button was clicked
      const selectedValue = this.value;
      // console.log("Selected Animal: " + selectedValue);
      clearAll()
      showAnimals(selectedValue)
      if(this.value==="all"){
        showAll()
      }
      
    });
  });

clearAll=()=>{
 const targetNodeList = document.querySelectorAll('[data-animal]');
    targetNodeList.forEach((node) => {
    // const animalValue = element.getAttribute('data-animal');
      node.classList.add('hidden');
   })
}

showAll=()=>{
   const targetNodeList = document.querySelectorAll('[data-animal]');
    targetNodeList.forEach((node) => {
    // const animalValue = element.getAttribute('data-animal');
      node.classList.remove('hidden');
   })
}



function showAnimals(selectedValue) {
  let targetElement="[data-animal="+selectedValue+"]"
  // const frogs = document.querySelectorAll('[data-animal="frog"]');
  const targetNodeList = document.querySelectorAll(targetElement);
  targetNodeList.forEach((node) => {
    node.classList.remove('hidden');
  });

  
   var images = document.querySelectorAll('img');
     images.forEach(function(img) {
        var altText = img.alt.toLowerCase();
       
            img.style.display = ''; // Show the image if alt text matches
      
    });
  
}

document.getElementById('filters').addEventListener('submit', function(event) {
    event.preventDefault(); 

    var searchTerm = document.getElementById('searchID').value.toLowerCase();
    var images = document.querySelectorAll('img');

    images.forEach(function(img) {
        var altText = img.alt.toLowerCase();
        if (altText.includes(searchTerm)) {
            img.style.display = ''; // Show the image if alt text matches
        } else {
            img.style.display = 'none'; // Hide the image if alt text doesn't match
        }
    });
});
